name: master-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The best BALL that
catches a POKéMON
without fail.
